description: Traditional fit with the addition of a tapered leg for a modern silhouette. Duers signature performance denim is interwoven with hip-to-toe fleece for warmth without the bulk of a lined denim. Duers signature gusset and stretch denim in combination with breathable fleece ensures all-day comfort. Finished with a water-repelling DWR treatment.
name: Duer Fireside Denim Relaxed Tapered Fit Jeans, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Relaxed - Developed for athletic builds, this 5-pocket offers a relaxed fit through the hip and thigh with a tapered leg. Technical features for extended range of motion, durability and comfort
